= Problems =

== Problem at line xx character xx: Read only. ==

 * *問題：*因為想在 closure 內共用 global 的變數，又不確定該 global 變數是否已存在，所以使用以下寫法：
{{{
/*global CONST
*/
(function () {
    CONST = CONST || {};
}());
}}}

 * *解法：*改用內部變數先接 global 變數，最後再丟回給 window
{{{
/*global window
*/
(function () {
    var CONST = window.CONST || {};
    //...
    window.CONST = CONST;
}());
}}}
